quote: I used to be with it. But then they changed what it was. Now what I’m with isn’t it, and what’s it seems scary and wierd. It’ll happen to you.
author: Abe Simpson

quote: My Homer is not a communist. He may be a liar, a pig, an idiot, a communist, but he is not a porn star.
author: Abe Simpson

quote: You know, you remind me of a poem I can’t remember, and a song that may never have existed, and a place I’m not sure I’ve ever been to.
author: Abe Simpson

quote: Sure! But it doesn’t mean you can’t live a long and pointless life.
author: Abe Simpson

quote: I just had the most beautiful dream where I died.
author: Apu

quote: Thank you, masked vigilante. Your over-zealous homicide has saved me 80 cents. Now if you’re not going to buy anything, please move along.
author: Apu

quote: You call this melted cheese receptacle clean? The young man you replaced is rolling over in his grave.
author: Apu

quote: Oh, my God. This boy is having an out-of-body experience. This is very... Bad for business.
author: Apu

quote: Jesus must be spinning in his grave!
author: Barney Gumble

quote: Hey, I didn’t get where I am putting tops on things.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: There’s a 4:30 in the morning now?
author: Bart Simpson

quote: Well, no offense lady, but what you don’t know, could fill a warehouse.
author: Bart Simpson

quote: it’s not an awkward silence, it’s more like a nothing needs to be said kind of silence.
author: Carl Carlson

quote: Boy, I tell ya, they only come out at night. Or in this case, the daytime.
author: Chief Wiggum

quote: Book 'em, Lou. One count of being a bear. And one count of being an accessory to being a bear.
author: Chief Wiggum

quote: Put out an APB for a male suspect, driving a... Car of some sort, heading in the direction of... You know, that place that sells chili. Suspect is hatless. Repeat, hatless
author: Chief Wiggum

quote: Fat Tony is a cancer on this fair city. He is the cancer, and I am the... Um... What cures cancer?
author: Chief Wiggum

quote: But Aqua man! You cannot marry a woman without gills! You’re from two different worlds!... Ooh I’ve wasted my life
author: Comic Book Guy

quote: Oh, loneliness and cheeseburgers are a dangerous mix..
author: Comic Book Guy

quote: Why must you turn my office into a house of lies?
author: Dentist

quote: If I could turn back the clock on my mother’s stair-pushing, I would certainly reconsider it.
author: Drederick Tatum

quote: Mr. Simpson, your silence will only incriminate you further.
author: Godfrey Jones

quote: Back in Edinburg, we had a coal miners strike. All we wanted were hats with a wee light on top. Then one day the mine collapsed. No one made it out alive, not even Willie!
author: Groundskeeper Willie

quote: Brothers and sisters are natural enemies! Like Englishmen and Scots! Or Welshmen and Scots! Or Japanese and Scots! Or Scots and other Scots! Damn Scots! They ruined Scotland!
author: Groundskeeper Willie

quote: If only this sugar were as sweet as you, sir.
author: Hans Moleman

quote: You’re banned from this Historical Society. You, and your children, and your children’s children!... For 3 months.
author: Historian

quote: I’m gonna come back with the greatest gift a husband can give his wife. An annulment from his secret wife.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Past instances in which I professed to like you were fraudulent.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I mock your value system, you also appear foolish in the eyes of others.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I’m drunk on love... And a beer.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I saw this in a movie about a bus that had to SPEED around the city, keeping its SPEED over 50. And if its SPEED dropped, it would explode! I think it was called Bus that couldn’t slow down.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Marriage is like a coffin and each kid is another nail.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: To Alcohol! The Cause Of... And Solution To... All Of Life’s Problems.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Weaseling out of things is important to learn; it’s what separates us from the animals… Except the weasel.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: If he’s so smart, how come he’s dead?
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Oh yeah, what are you gonna do? Release the dogs? Or the bees? Or the dogs with bees in their mouths and when they bark, they shoot bees at you?
author: Homer Simpson

quote: A woman is a lot like a refrigerator: 6 feet tall, 300 pounds… it makes ice.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Well, let’s just call them... Uh, 'Mr. X' and 'Mrs. Y'. So anyway, Mr. X would say, 'Marge, if this doesn’t get your motor running, my name isn’t Homer J. Simpson!'
author: Homer Simpson

quote: That’s it! You people have stood in my way long enough. I’m going to clown college!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: It’s not easy to juggle a pregnant wife and a troubled child, but somehow I managed to fit in eight hours of TV a day.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: America’s health care system is second only to Japan… Canada, Sweden, Great Britain… well, all of Europe. But you can thank your lucky stars we don’t live in Paraguay!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: You tried your best and you failed miserably. The lesson is, never try.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Another day, another box of stolen pens.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Just because I don’t care doesn’t mean that I don’t understand.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Well, it’s 1 am. Better go home and spend some quality time with the kids.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: In America, first you get the sugar, then you get the women, then you get the money.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: So I says, blue M&M, red M&M- they all wind up the same color in the end.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: So I said to him, 'Look, buddy. Your car was upside down when we got here. And as for your grandma, she shouldn’t have mouthed off like that.'
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Asleep at the switch?! I wasn’t asleep, I was drunk!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: In this house we obey the laws of thermodynamics!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Pfft, science! Has science ever kissed a woman? or won the Super Bowl? or put a man on the moon? This is what I think of your precious science!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: For once, maybe someone will call me 'sir' without adding, 'you’re making a scene.'
author: Homer Simpson

quote: You kids should thank your mother. Now that she’s a better person, we can see how awful we really are.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: She knew my one weakness... That I’m weak!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Now I have to face stupid reality again.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Finally, a way to combine my love of helping people with my love of hurting people
author: Homer Simpson

quote: It takes two to lie: one to lie and one to listen
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I believe that children are our future. Unless we stop them now.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Hey that’s a half-truth!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I’ve figured out the boy’s punishment: First, he’s grounded. No leaving the house, not even for school. Second, no egg nog. In fact, no nog, period. And third, absolutely no stealing for 3 months.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Sorry, Lisa. Can’t change the future.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Now, what is a wedding? Webster’s Dictionary defines a wedding as 'The process of removing weeds from one’s garden.'
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Marge, I’m going to miss you so much. And it’s not just the sex. It’s also the food preparation.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: From now on I’ll never leave the room without saying how much I love you and... This takes a long time. Maybe a pat on your butt will do... that’s it.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Well, it’s not quite a mop, and it’s not quite a bucket, but boy will it, hahaha. So to answer your question Lisa, I don’t know.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: The joke’s on him! I’ll be dead by then.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I’m in an abusive relationship with life. It keeps beating the hell out of me, and I’m too much of a coward to leave.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: What advantages does this motorcar have over, say, a train? Which I could also afford.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I’m not gonna lie to you Marge... So long!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Marge, if you were married to Da Vinci, you wouldn’t tell him not to Da Vinch.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: It’s a pornography store. I was buying pornography.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: [Chuckles] Yeah... That was just a lie.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Le grille!? What the hell is that?
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Shut up, shut up! If I don’t hear you, it’s not illegal.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Okay, Marge, if anyone asks... you require 24-hour nursing care, Lisa’s a clergyman... Maggie is seven people, and Bart was wounded in Vietnam.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I remember your exact words. You said I should quit my job and become an inventor, or you’d torch the house.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I wish God were alive to see this.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Son, when you participate in sporting events, it’s not whether or you win or lose, it’s how drunk you get.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Marge? Kids? Everything’s going to be just fine. Now go upstairs, and pack your bags... We’re going to start a new life under the sea.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: I’m not looking for glory or wealth. I’m just buying that stairway to heaven that Jesus sang about.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: when you’ve sustained as many blows to the head as I have consistency is something, something that something... I love you, Bart.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Oh, Bart, you say that now. But when you’re grown up, you’ll just think it.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: You let me down, man! Now I don’t believe in nothing no more. I’m going to law school.
author: Jimbo Jones

quote: A philanthropist. A humanitarian. A man of peace. These are just a few of the men who have come to spit on Montgomery Burns’ grave.
author: Kent Brockman

quote: Professor, without knowing precisely what the danger is, would you say it’s time for our viewers to crack each other’s heads open and feast on the goo inside?
author: Kent Brockman

quote: As a young boy, I dreamed of being a baseball.
author: Kodos

quote: A great man once observed: 90% of success is showing up on time. Sorry I’m four hours late...
author: Krusty The Clown

quote: Go out on a Tuesday? Who am I, Charlie Sheen?
author: Marge Simpson

quote: Sand makes me sad because it used to be big rocks. But not anymore... Not anymore
author: Marge Simpson

quote: Let’s get some beer in you, and then it’s right to bed
author: Marge Simpson

quote: Remember the time he ate my goldfish? And you lied and said I never had a goldfish. Then why did I have the bowl, Bart? Why did I have the bowl?
author: Milhouse Van Houten

quote: We started out like Romeo and Juliet, but instead it ended up in tragedy!
author: Milhouse Van Houten

quote: Your tears say more than real evidence ever could.
author: Moderator

quote: Well, I’m better than dirt. Well, most kinds of dirt. I mean not that fancy store bought dirt. That stuffs loaded with nutrients. I.. I can’t compete with that stuff.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: Guess I’ll just have to become beautiful on the inside.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: Hey, hey, I may be ugly and hate-filled, but I, um... What was the third thing you said?
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: I’ve done stuff I ain’t proud of. And the stuff I am proud of is disgusting.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: Looks like me and Marge are both going to hell. That’s where I’ll make my move.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: I can’t build a relationship on a lie. The lies come later.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: Of all the kisses I have ever gotten in my life, that was the first.
author: Moe Szyslak

quote: This Anonymous Clan Of Slack-Jawed Troglodytes Has Cost Me The Election. And Yet, If I Were To Have Them Killed, I Would Be The One To Go To Jail. That’s Democracy For You.
author: Mr. Burns

quote: Since the beginning of time, man has yearned to destroy the sun.
author: Mr. Burns

quote: Men, there’s a little crippled boy sitting in a hospital who wants you to win this game. I know because I crippled him myself, to inspire you.
author: Mr. Burns

quote: So I want you to remember some inspiring words that someone else might have told you over the course of your lives, and go out there and win!
author: Mr. Burns

quote: I can’t be held responsible for what my goons were ordered to do!
author: Mr. Burns

quote: Now, a few more details about this year’s company picnic - It’s at the plant, no food will be served, the only activity will be work, and the picnic is cancelled.
author: Mr. Burns

quote: Yeah, a crazy guy shot a bunch of people and the subway ran over my hat.
author: Ned Flanders

quote: And Harry Potter and all his friends went straight to hell for practising witchcraft!
author: Ned Flanders

quote: Oh, wow, windows. I don’t think I could afford this place.
author: Otto

quote: They call ’em fingers, but I never see ’em fing... Oh wait, there they go.
author: Otto

quote: Am I so out of touch? No, it’s the children who are wrong!
author: Principal Skinner

quote: Well, it could have been a day, it could have been the rest of my life... It was only a day.
author: Principal Skinner

quote: Me fail English? That’s unpossible.
author: Ralph Wiggum

quote: Me fail English? That’s unpossible!
author: Ralph Wiggum

quote: Ned, have you considered any of the other major religions? They’re all pretty much the same.
author: Reverend Lovejoy

quote: I stole this accordion from a blind monkey. But you! You disgust me!
author: Sailor

quote: Only who can prevent forest fires?... You pressed 'You' referring to me. That is incorrect, the correct answer is you.
author: Smokey the Bear Robot

quote: Get down on your knees, pray to your God, and ask him... No, demand he tell you the answer! And if he won’t, he is no God of yours!
author: Superintendent Chalmers

quote: Good evening sir! Would you please leave without a fuss right now?
author: Valet

quote: Perhaps if I search the employee evaluations for the word 'incompetent'. 714 names? Better be more specific. 'lazy', 'clumsy', 'dim-witted', 'monstrously ugly'. 714 names? Aw, nuts to this. I’ll just get Homer Simpson.
author: Waylon Smithers

quote: Oh, Mr. Burns, we’ll thaw you out the second they discover the cure for seventeen stab wounds in the back.
author: Waylon Smithers

quote: I sleep under my bed every night cause I’m scared of the cars from Cars. If gasoline is their food, then why do they have teeth?!
author: Milhouse Van Houten

quote: Sounds like Springfield’s got a discipline problem. Maybe that’s why we beat them at football nearly half the time.
author: Shelbyville guy

quote: Marge, kids, everything’s going to be just fine. Now go upstairs, pack your bags. We’re going to begin a new life under the sea.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Oh, look at me! I’m making people happy! I’m the magical man from Happyland in a gumdrop house on Lollipop Lane!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Hello, Simpson. I’m riding the bus today because Mother hid my car keys to punish me for talking to a woman on the phone. She was right to do it.
author: Principal Skinner

quote: I’ve always admired car owners... And I hope to be one myself as soon as I finish paying off mother. She insists I pay retroactively for the food I ate as a child.
author: Principal Skinner

quote: Milhouse, give him back his soul. I’ve got work tomorrow.
author: Kirk Van Houten

quote: To Lisa, someday you will have a coffee table. Love, dad.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: No, Lisa. The only monster here is the gambling monster... That has enslaved your mother! I call him Gamblor!
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Now for that happy period between the lie and the time it’s found out.
author: Homer Simpson

quote: Recycling is useless, Lis. Once the sun burns out, this planet is doomed. You’re just making sure we spend our last days using inferior products.
author: Bart Simpson
